caption.p: Comparison of the Sémont with the SémontPLUS maneuver. (A) Scatter plot of the time to recover for the Sémont (left) and the SémontPLUS maneuver (right) in days. (B) Histogram of time to recover for the Sémont (red) and the SémontPLUS maneuver, purple, which is due to the overlay of red (SM) and blue (SM+), in days.
